Chapter:
Localize rings
The package &LocalizeRingForHomalg; defines the classes of local(ized) rings, local ring elements and local matrices. A &homalg; local ring element contains two &homalg; ring elements numerator and denominator. A &homalg; local matrix contains a global &homalg; matrix as a numerator and a ring element as a denominator.
